item.title: The first supermoon of 2025 will light up Australian skies tonight
item.description: <p>The October full moon –﻿ also known as harvest moon – will make an appearance tonight.</p>

item.title: 'Lower the aggro': Battle breaks out between competing lawyers to represent accused Sydney shooter
item.description: <p>A man accused of spraying a busy street with up to 100 bullets, injuring 16 people, has had to break up a dispute between his representatives in court.</p>

item.title: Vandals target billboard and Officeworks in Melbourne with pro-Hamas graffiti
item.description: <p>Deputy Prime Minister Richard Marles described the vandalism on the second anniversary of the October 7 terrorist attack as &quot;disgraceful&quot;.</p>

item.title: Last drinks? We could be on the cusp of a great Australian cultural change
item.description: <p>A study of over 23,000 Aussies found abstaining from alcohol is on the rise, as is weekly alcohol consumption.</p>

item.title: Man arrested after allegedly pointing firearm at place of worship in Sydney
item.description: <p>T﻿wo men allegedly drove past the building with one aiming what was believed to be a firearm.</p>

item.title: Ex-police boss's porn-sharing nephew fails to get job back with the force
item.description: <p>A former police commissioner&#x27;s nephew who shared pornographic material with his mates has failed to get his job back with the force.</p>

item.title: Downpour breaks October daily record in WA gold mining community
item.description: <p>The downpour broke a record first set in 1939.</p>

item.title: Woman missing in North Queensland found safe and well
item.description: <p>Police say a 21-year-old woman reported missing in North Queensland today has been found.</p>

item.title: Deloitte to partially refund the government after using AI in $440,000 report
